allow: Bash("/mnt/c/Program Files/GitHub CLI/gh.exe" repo view bill-ramos-rmoswi/docker-babelfishpg-devtools --json name,isPrivate)

Bash("$GH" issue create --title "Add Claude CLI to DevContainer for AI-assisted development" --body "## Problem
Claude CLI (claude.ai/code) is not available inside the DevContainer environment, preventing AI-assisted development when working inside the container.

## Solution
Install Claude CLI in the DevContainer to enable seamless AI-assisted development workflow.

## Requirements
- Install Claude CLI in the Dockerfile or DevContainer features
- Ensure Claude CLI is available in PATH
- Configure proper permissions for postgres user
- Test that Claude CLI works with /summary command

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Claude CLI is installed and available in DevContainer
- [ ] claude command is accessible from terminal
- [ ] Works with postgres user (default DevContainer user)
- [ ] Can load CLAUDE.md context with /summary command
- [ ] Documentation updated with Claude CLI usage in DevContainer" --label "enhancement" --label "devcontainer" --assignee "@me" -R $REPO)
